title: Chaya Macrobiotics - Shiodome
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Macrobiotic food cafe located near popular Ginza district. Menu features mostly vegan food: salads, curries, burgers, soups, stews. Some dishes with fish. Prices from 800 to 1300yen per dish. Address in Japanese 東京都港区東新橋1-6-3 ロイヤルパーク汐留タワー1F
